EmailTemplate.name: 201911_Global_HoneywellForgePTMD_KK.Honeywell Forge now includes PTMD - Final
EmailTemplate.subject: PTMD migration to Honeywell Forge [COMPLETED]
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace1.honeywell.com/]]> Your PTMD migration is now completed! In follow-up to our prior communication, we are in the process of migrating all Predictive Trend Monitoring and Diagnostics (PTMD) applications into the Honeywell Forge platform. There is no additional cost associated with the transition to Honeywell Forge. We have completed the migration of your company's assets into the new application. See below for details. You can log in to your new PTMD app right away:
- Visit: https://aerospace1.honeywell.com/ <[[https://aerospace1.honeywell.com/]]> - Launch Connected Maintenance - User name: use your existing user name - Password: use your existing password
You can start using the system immediately:
- You can view the migration guide that covers the familiar features in the new interface - Access the system and log problems with your data - Explore the new interface and note any inconsistencies
Note: we will provide a 90-day migration period for users to continue to access the legacy PTMD application until March 31st, 2020.
Since all existing features remain, we do not anticipate any disruptions to your using the system, but if you do experience issues with parameters, notification triggers, or handling of the system, feel free to contact your local PTMD support representative below:
Airline Region
Honeywell Forge PTMD Support
Contact email
EMEAI
Heiner Bruns
Heiner.Bruns@honeywell.com <[[mailto:heiner.bruns@honeywell.com]]>

Ravi.Ramaiah@honeywell.com <[[mailto:Ravi.Ramaiah@honeywell.com]]>
If you have questions or comments about the migration of PTMD to Honeywell Forge, please contact Krasimir.Koychev@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Krasimir.Koychev@Honeywell.com]]>. DOWNLOAD NOW <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Honeywell_Forge_PTMD_Migration.pdf]]> © {{my.year}} Honeywell International Inc. This message was sent to {{lead.Email Address:default=NA}}. If you don't want to receive these emails from Honeywell in the future, you can edit your profile <[[]]> or unsubscribe <[[https://explore.honeywell.com/Unsubscribepage.html]]>.
